price: Ẹ máa lọ sí ibi èéfín ẹlẹ́ka mẹ́ta.
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ ظِلّٖ ذِي ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā ẓillin dhī thalāthi shuʿabin
